## Summary
Light/dark HUD themes and animated avatar states.

## Requirements
- Theme engine using CSS vars.
- Avatar sprite sheet for idle/listening/alert.
- Settings toggle for user preferences.

## Acceptance Criteria
- Theme persists across restarts.
- Avatar reflects state changes.

## Dependencies
- FR-003 HUD
- FR-010 Data & Security
